backlog.description: Validate survey weights and replicate design metadata
Generate exploratory weighted summaries for key outcomes
Monitor for sponsor-provided survey design metadata updates
Draft sponsor-ready brief summarizing design metadata gaps and needed files
Follow up with sponsor on requested design deliverables
Update design files upon receipt of sponsor metadata
Estimate H1 active religion practice rates by biological sex
Develop H2 analysis script for religion strictness vs adult happiness change
Update manuscript and reports with design context and H1 findings

next_actions.desc: Develop H2 analysis script for religion strictness vs adult happiness change
Draft manuscript update summarizing design assumptions and H1 findings

regeneration_commands.h1_religion_analysis: python scripts/analyze_h1_religion_by_biomale.py --csv childhoodbalancedpublic_original.csv --config config/agent_config.yaml --design docs/survey_design.yaml --out tables/h1_religion_by_biomale.csv --diff-out tables/h1_religion_by_biomale_diff.csv --manifest artifacts/h1_religion_by_biomale_manifest.json
